attributes.action: override Basingstoke council to allow us our demcratic right to opt for an elected mayor
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: because the ruling Conservative group of Basingstoke & Deane borough council have been undemocratic and unconstitutional in not allowing us the right to opt for an elected mayor. I believe it is right that the government should now intervene to allow us our democratic right to opt for an elected mayor
